Summary: 5 people all adults observed obect as it passed by us we all observed it moving against the wind and then hover and change diection
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Hamburg
There were no other sightings in Hamburg on or around July 27th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting at a campfire with 2 other people the other woman first said what is that her son said the same and pointed at the object I looked up saw this glowing cilinder, it appeared to be moving slowly east to west Iwe realized that wind was moving west to east by this time my husband and another man were watching and commenting on its direction and speed and shape etc it seemed to hover and change ejection to north, we watched it until it went of site
